name: Spectro (itch)
description:
Welcome to Spectro, a game created for a school project in 48h game jam.

The Principles :

You are a ghost trying to escape death from light.

The lights are coming from all sides taking 2 different forms :

Sphere : spawning randomly, bouncing on walls and killing the player. Be careful they are faster and faster with time.

Laser : targeting the player and slowing him down.

You have to absorb little ghosts to gain score :

Red ghost : 25 pts

Green ghost : 50 pts

Yellow ghost : 75 pts

Blue ghost : 100 pts

Controls :

ARROWS

UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT
